issue.title: Python: Expose a C function to convert arrow::Table to pyarrow.Table
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-425](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-425). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Provide a (private api) C function that converts/wraps a C++ `arrow::Table` to a Python `pyarrow.Table`. This can be used so that libraries depending on Arrow can expose their C++ results to Python without the need for a Cython dependency.
